divs: Sighting Detailsmy mother first saw this out of her bedroom window..we've seen strange lights off and on for years...we now look for them..at first i thought it was the moon..but it kept "flashing" in brillance..it might even have been two objects in tandem..i watched it flare up in brillance at least twice and then fade out so that it almost disappeared.since we have spotted these.. it was not scarey just very interesting..it finally just faded from sight...would be interested to know if anyone else spotted this...
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Concord
There were no other sightings in Concord on or around March 31st 2006
